data_table.description: ECG Machine Coding, ECGS, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ECGD02
variable.description: ECGsent - same as ECGD57 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD04
variable.description: Filter setting - not used - blank [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD08
variable.description: Quality grade (Noise/mm, overall drift/mm, beat to beat drift/mm) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD26
variable.description: Minnesota code C93 (P-wave amplitude > 2.5 MM in any of leads II, III, aVF in majority of beats) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
P-wave amplitude more or equal to 2.5 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF, in a majority of beats

variable.name: ECGD27
variable.description: Minnesota code C94 (QRS transition zone) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
QRS transition zone at V3 or to the right of V3 on the chest. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)
QRS transition zone at V4 or to the left of V4 on the chest. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: ECGD28
variable.description: Minnesota code C95 (T-wave amplitude) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
T-wave amplitude > 12 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, V1, V2, V3, V4, V5, V6. (Do not code in the presence of 6-4-1, 7-1-1, 7-2-1 or 7-4.)

variable.name: ECGD29
variable.description: Minnesota code E7 (duration criteria for R-E score for LVH) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
QRS Duration > 90 MS OR intrinscord deflection V5 OR V6 > 50 MS

variable.name: ECGD57
variable.description: V3 ECG sent to Minn [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No
Yes

variable.name: ECGD58
variable.description: V3 ECG abnormal sent [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No
Yes

variable.name: ECGD59
variable.description: V3 & V1 sent for serial change [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No
Yes

variable.name: ECGD60
variable.description: V3 - not significant - random sample [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD61
variable.description: V3 & V1 serial change QC [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No
Yes

variable.name: ECGD62
variable.description: V1 ECG sent [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No
Yes

variable.name: ECGD63
variable.description: V3 & V2 sent for serial change [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No

variable.name: ECGD64
variable.description: V2 ECG sent [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No

variable.name: ECGD30
variable.description: CIIS value [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGDFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: Presence

variable.name: ECGDCY
variable.description: Contact year [7] [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD32
variable.description: Q or Qs amplitude: I [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD33
variable.description: Q or Qs amplitude: III [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD09
variable.description: Minnesota code L1 (Q-Q.S. pattern I, aVL, V6) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead a VL
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec lead I or V6
Q/R amplitude ratio more or equal to 1/5 and < 1/3, plus Q duration more or equal to 0.02 sec and < 0.03 sec in lead I or V6
Q duration more or equal to 0.03 sec and < 0.04 sec, plus R amplitude more or equal to 3 mm in lead aVL

variable.name: ECGD10
variable.description: Minnesota code F1 (Q-Q.S. Pattern II, III, aVF) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD11
variable.description: Minnesota code V1 (Q-Q.S. Pattern V1-V5) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD12
variable.description: Minnesota code L4 (ST junction & segment depression I, aVL, V6) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
Missing
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ECGD13
variable.description: Minnesota code F4 (ST junction & segment depression II, III, aVF) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped, in any of leads I, aVL, or V6
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm but < 2.0 mm, and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads I, aVL, or V6

variable.name: ECGD14
variable.description: Minnesota code V4 (ST junction & segment depression V1-V5) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
STJ depression more or equal to 0.5 mm and < 1.0 mm and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5
No STJ depression as much as 0.5 mm, but ST segment downward sloping and segment or T-wave nadir more or equal to 0.5 mm below P-R baseline in any of leads V2 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 1.0 mm and ST segment upward sloping or U-shaped in any of leads V1 - V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1-V5
STJ depression more or equal to 2.0 and ST segment horizontal or downward sloping in any of leads V1 - V5

variable.name: ECGD15
variable.description: Minnesota code L5 (T wave I, aVL, V6) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in either of leads I, V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm

T amplitude negative or diphasic (positive-negative or negative-positive type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead I or V6, or in lead aVL when R amplitude is more or equal to 5.0 mm
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads I, aVL, V6; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ECGD16
variable.description: Minnesota code F5 (T wave II, III, aVF) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
T amplitude negative or diphasic with negative phase (negative-positive or positive-negative type) at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm in lead II, or in lead aVF when QRS is mainly upright
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase in lead II; not Coded in lead aVF
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in lead II; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ECGD17
variable.description: Minnesota code V5 (T wave V1-V5) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
T amplitude negative 5.0 mm or more in any of leads V2 - V5
T amplitude negative (flat), or diphasic (negative-positive or positive-negative type) with negative phase at least 1.0 mm but not as deep as 5.0 mm, in any of leads V2 - V5
T amplitude zero (flat), or negative, or diphasic (negative-positive type only) with less than 1.0 mm negative phase, in any of leads V3 - V5
T amplitude positive and T/R amplitude ratio < 1/20 in any of leads V3, V4, V5; R wave amplitude must be more or equal to 10.0 mm

variable.name: ECGD18
variable.description: Minnesota code L92 (ST segment elevation anterolateral site (leads I, aVL, V6)) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in any of leads I, aVL, V6

variable.name: ECGD19
variable.description: Minnesota code F92 (ST segment elevation posterior (inferior) site (leads II, III, aVF)) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in any of leads II, III, aVF

variable.name: ECGD20
variable.description: Minnesota code V92 ((ST segment elevation anterior site (leads V1, V2, V3, V4, V5)) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
ST segment elevation more or equal to 1.0 mm in lead V5 or ST segment elevation more or equal to 2.0 mm in any of leads V1 - V4

variable.name: ECGD21
variable.description: Minnesota code C2 (QRS axis deviation codes) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent

Right (optional code when 2-2 is not present). QRS axis from +90o through +119o in leads I, II, III. (The algebraic sum of major positive and major negative QRS waves must be zero or negative in I and positive in II and III.)
Missing
Missing

Left. QRS axis from -30o through -90o in leads I, II, III. (The algebraic sum of major positive and major negative QRS waves must be zero or positive in I, negative in III, and zero or negative in II.)

Right. QRS axis from +120o through -150o in leads I, II, III. (The algebraic sum of major positive and major negative QRS waves must be negative in I, and zero or positive in III, and in I must be one-half or more of that in III.)

variable.name: ECGD22
variable.description: Minnesota code C3 (high amplitude R wave codes) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Right: R amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm and R amplitude more or equal to S amplitude in the majority of beats in lead V1, when S amplitude is > R amplitude somewhere to the left on the chest of V1

Left: R amplitude > 26 mm in either V5 or V6, or R amplitude > 20.0 mm in any of leads I, II, III, aVF, or R amplitude > 12.0 mm in lead aVL. (All criteria measured only on second to last complete normal beat.)

Right: R amplitude more or equal to 5.0 mm and R amplitude more or equal to S amplitude in the majority of beats in lead V1, when S amplitude is > R amplitude somewhere to the left on the chest of V1 (codes 7-3 and 3-2, if criteria for both are present)

variable.name: ECGD23
variable.description: Minnesota code C6 (A-V conduction defect codes) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
P-R (P-Q) interval more or equal to 0.22 sec in the majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Missing
Short P-R interval. P-R interval < 0.12 sec in all beats of any two of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF
Missing

variable.name: ECGD24
variable.description: Minnesota code C7 (ventricular conduction defect) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Missing
Missing
Incomplete right bundle branch block. QRS duration < 0.12 sec in each of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF, and R' > R in either of leads V1, V2
Intraventricular block. QRS duration more or equal to 0.12 sec in a majority of beats in any of leads I, II, III, aVL, aVF. (7-4 suppresses all 2, 3, 4, 5, 9-2, 9-4, 9-5 codes.)
R-R' pattern in either of leads V1, V2 with R' amplitude more or equal to R

Incomplete left bundle branch block. (Do not code in the presence of any codable Q- or QS-wave.) QRS duration more or equal to 0.10 sec and < 0.12 in the majority of beats of each of leads I, aVL, and V5 or V6

variable.name: ECGD25
variable.description: Minnesota code C91 (low QRS amplitude) [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
variable.value: No Minnesota code equivalent
Low QRS amplitude. QRS peak-to-peak amplitude < 5 mm in all beats in each of leads I, II, III, or < 10 mm in all beats in each of leads V1 - V6. (Check calibration before coding.)

variable.name: ECGD34
variable.description: Q or Qs amplitude: V5 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD35
variable.description: Q or Qs amplitude: V6 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD36
variable.description: R amplitude: I [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD37
variable.description: R amplitude: III [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD38
variable.description: R amplitude: aVL [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD39
variable.description: R amplitude: V2 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD40
variable.description: R amplitude: V5 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD41
variable.description: R amplitude: V6 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD42
variable.description: S amplitude: I [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD43
variable.description: S amplitude: III [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD44
variable.description: S amplitude: V1 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD45
variable.description: S amplitude: V2 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD46
variable.description: S amplitude: V5 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD47
variable.description: S amplitude: V6 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD48
variable.description: T negative amplitude: aVL [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD49
variable.description: T negative amplitude: aVF [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD50
variable.description: T negative amplitude: V6 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD51
variable.description: T positive amplitude: aVR [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD52
variable.description: T positive amplitude: V1 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD53
variable.description: T positive amplitude: V6 [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD07
variable.description: Recording time [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD07H
variable.description: Recording time: hour [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD07M
variable.description: Recording time: minute [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD31
variable.description: Heart rate [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD54
variable.description: QRS interval [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD55
variable.description: OE measurement [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: ECGD56
variable.description: OV6 measurement [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [ECG Machine Coding (ECGD04), exam 3]
